title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.16 - Sales to other than licensed organizations or lessors prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.16 - Sales to other than licensed organizations or lessors prohibited

State Regulations

No licensed games of chance supplier, its duly authorized
agents, salespersons or representatives, shall, during the term of such
license, sell or distribute games of chance supplies, devices or equipment in
the State of New York to other than an organization licensed to conduct games
of chance or licensed authorized games of chance lessors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4607.16

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
